title: Apple AirPods 3 are back to $150 ($29 off) at Amazon
content:
The Apple AirPods 3, also known as the 3rd Generation AirPods, was released late last year with an updated design inspired by the more-expensive AirPods Pro. Apple has dropped the price to $150 at least twice already at major retailers (give or take a few cents), but if you missed out on those discounts, the third-generation

The post Apple AirPods 3 are back to $150 ($29 off) at Amazon appeared first on xda-developers.
